ChoiS

Introduction

Almeng is a co-ed duo currently signed under Majesty Entertainment. They are best known for their appearance on K-pop Star 3 after making it to the Top 6. Following the show, they signed and debuted under YNB Entertainment on October 21, 2014, with their first mini-album compoSing of Love.
